website_summaries.verdict: Owners say their cats can't get enough of these gourmet recipes – and with 12 to 24 cans, there's plenty to keep them coming back for more.
pros: Comes in cases of 12 or 24 cans that provide both variety and value in recipes and flavors most cats love
Chef-inspired meals include tuna, chicken, garden vegetable, seafood, and turkey flavors
Includes shreds and pate' with added greens and savory sauces
cons: A few owners reported that their cats don't care for the juicy consistency, but most rave about how eager their cats are to eat it

customer_reviews.title: Not our cats favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This product gave our cats diarrhea. Plus one can came damaged and leaked cat food on other cans. Had to take cat to vet for treatment. I threw this cat food away and won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Beware one bad flavor?
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I have 3 cats who All vomited after eating this particular flavor. When my daughter my mistake feed them that flavor again several days later, none of the cats would touch it. I will not order this package again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Enrile

customer_reviews.title: None seemed to like or eat
customer_reviews.text: 3 indoor cats and one outdoor cat. None seemed to like or eat. Perhaps the product is iwaste in raw chicken shipped to China process. Fancy feast at one point was the preferred product. I no longer find that to be true.
customer_reviews.author: truthseeker

customer_reviews.title: Damaged can
customer_reviews.text: I received a dented can, again, in the mail today. I won't feed this to my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Cox

customer_reviews.title: Zanie Hated It
customer_reviews.text: Thirteen year old cat with kidney disease would not eat this food and neither would any of his house mates. It was not spoiled or anything they just didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Chow

customer_reviews.title: My cats don't like it
customer_reviews.text: My cats (3) don't like it. Liesl eats everything and will only eat a little when fed to her.
customer_reviews.author: Averi A.

customer_reviews.title: Product represented with discrepant quantity info
customer_reviews.text: The description of this item is discrepant. When I look at it in my orders, it looks like you'll receive 12 cans for 17.94, however, when you look at the full description while shopping, it shows you that you'll receive 24 cans - which is far more appropriate for the price. I think this product has been posted with incorrect information. I received 12 cans for 17.84, which I would never pay. Full description = Purina Fancy Feast Medleys Tuscany Collection Gourmet Wet Cat Food Variety Pack- 24-3 oz. Cans
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love It
customer_reviews.text: After Trying many different brands for 4 different cats, finally found 1 they all can agree on.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Montero

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why this flavor was so bad.
customer_reviews.text: This made my cat violently ill. Not sure why this flavor was so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Cats refused to eat it
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it is a great product but our cats hated it. Will stick to the classic pates instead
customer_reviews.author: E. L.

customer_reviews.title: Made a big difference for Kitty Mitty.
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a rescued cat that had been on the streets hungry and cold. When she sees the can the non stop meows start until she has her teeth on the food. She was very thin when we adopted her in March, now she is at a healthy weight. I rinse the can with a little water and add it to the food, she loves the gravy it makes. Fancy Feast and Blue dry food has made such a difference, her hair is silky, and she has more energy too.
customer_reviews.author: What's up with that?

customer_reviews.title: If your cats are pigs they will inhale this food
customer_reviews.text: I buy wet food every once in a while as a treat to my tabbies since they’re always stuck eating dry food. I usually don’t like buying this brand because the cans are so small and I have 3 cats so it goes by super fast. My cats love these flavors to death, after they're done eating they will literally sit at their bowls and beg like crackheads for hours until I give in and feed them more smh(this is why they're usually stuck with dry food)... I guess for the price it's not that bad. Sadly, I will be buying this again for them in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Purina Fancy Feast Medleys Adult Wet Cat Food Variety Pack
customer_reviews.text: Our cat likes all three flavors provided in the Tuscany Collection. This cat food is one of the many foods recommended by a DVM and who provides the nutritional composition of many wet cat foods. The vet suggests that cats are much better off not eating dry cat foods. Since our cat has a tendency to put on weight, the nutritional data allows one to choose among various cat foods to better control a cat's weight.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Food Kitties Enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Purina Fancy Feast White Meat Chicken Recipe is a mostly healthy food that my cats actually enjoy eating. I'm impressed that it gets to them to eat something other than just meat and gravy. I have four furry family members, and if I dish the food out properly, I can feed all of them in a single meal from one can. So for 4 cats I would figure 2 cans a day. I have dry food for them to graze on and they take advantage of that as well, but they love to have their "softies" in the morning and evening. ~ Kort
customer_reviews.author: Kort

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Feast canned cat food with greens - YUM
customer_reviews.text: Cats gobble this food. They really like it and look for it in the morning. If I give them something else they meow until I give them this food! They get dry food in the afternoon and are not as excited as when this is served.
customer_reviews.author: DBeck

customer_reviews.title: NO BOX!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The problem was that this box pf 24 was shipped as is, when I brought it into my home, (i just had double hip replacement) the entire bottom of the box split open all over my porch, and entry way to my home. 2 cans hit my big toes hard. PLEASE BOX THEM INSIDE BOXES NEXT TIME.... NOT HAPPY....
customer_reviews.author: sue carse

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonders for our cat with liver issue.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food we can feed our cat who has been battling a liver problem for over a year. We tried so many different brands and even resorted to making our own and nothing was helping. We found this and she has been eating it 4 times a day and has finally gained weight. The vet was very pleased with how she is doing. We can only feed her the chicken medley as any other flavors and she starts going downhill. Don't know why or how but we are sticking with it as she has more energy and looks so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Happy2Wander

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase Gravy Lovers or Seafood and I thought I would get my fur babies a treat. They ate this, but, left tons on their plates unlike the Gravy ones. I wished they liked it more than they do because of the price, but, they know what the like.
customer_reviews.author: IvanaYvonne

customer_reviews.title: The Cat will Eat This
customer_reviews.text: Tried a lot of canned foods, we keep coming back to this because the cat eats it consistently. The bits of meat in the can have gotten bigger over the years, not sure why, so I have to cut it up a bit more. Wish it was a bit less expensive, but the cat likes it and eats it so there ya go. Cats.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Feast White Meat Chicken with Turkey, Salt, Caustic Soda/Lye, and Meat-by-Products
customer_reviews.text: My rescue cat prefers two of the three varieties in this box (she doesn't care for the Tuscany). I was sad to find there is turkey, lye, loads of salt, and meat-by-products included. When I read "white meat chicken", I take it to mean it is white meat chicken with added good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: BanTrophyHunting

customer_reviews.title: Price change
customer_reviews.text: My cats like the primavera food. It was a great deal but recently went up in price. Approximately, $8.00. Big jump. I can buy it at the stores for the lower price and will but I did like the convienience of buying online.
customer_reviews.author: M1A2R3Y4

customer_reviews.title: incomplete/ poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The box had been opened and taped shut... it was missing 2 cans of the cat food! a label was placed on the box itself and mailed that way... the box is not sturdy enough to go through the mail, obviously.
customer_reviews.author: PowerPraise

customer_reviews.title: A Pauper's Meal
customer_reviews.text: The royalty does not appreciate this sludge. What are these bits of crap in here? All they ate was the gravy. The royalty would like you to know that can of gravy ONLY would be much appreciated over them being required tom chew their canned food. Maybe also to pour over dry food so it doesn't expose the bottom of the bowl as fast.
customer_reviews.author: K G

customer_reviews.title: My Siamese Cat Loves Fancy Feast Medley Canned Cat Food!
customer_reviews.text: My Siamese girl loves this Fancy Feast Medleys collection of canned cat food! She paces up and down while I'm getting it ready in her bowl. This makes a nice change versus other meat canned foods.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Markham - izzylea

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of this product as my cats love it I just wish that they had more of the brand with spinach in gravy that seems to be their favorite but I can only get it if I buy the bundle
customer_reviews.author: Carol West

customer_reviews.title: Wet Food for Cat Hydration
customer_reviews.text: Long grain rice and garden greens in a savory sauce complement the proteins for a meal that will have your cat licking her dish clean. Each meal delivers complete and balanced nutrition and contains essential vitamins and minerals to support your feline friend's health. Wet Food for Cat Hydration. Try it spread on toast, can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rootes Author

customer_reviews.title: Oh happy days
customer_reviews.text: Have such a picky cat and I think I have finally found a cat food he likes. Knock on wood. Have bought this 3 times so I am thanking my lucky stars he is happy and I am not tossing out food.
customer_reviews.author: Gramcracker

customer_reviews.title: My cats eat everything but the meat!
customer_reviews.text: This looks yummy and must taste great. My two three year old cats love it and my senior cat loves it. Oddly enough, they lick up everything except whatever meat is in it. But they do that with all canned cat food, except the pate. Each cat gets 1/3 of a can in the morning and another 1/3 at night. They nibble on dry food during the day so I'm sure they get their protein.
customer_reviews.author: Dianneb36801

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up from my cats!
customer_reviews.text: My cats are so finicky. I moved them up from their regular brand because they got so they didn't like it. Some of these flavors they like, and some they don't like. All in all, they are better than the previous brand I've been buying them. And, to not waste, I give my 2 cats a half can at a time so there's not much waste. Even though these are more expensive than any of the cat food brands, it's more economical in the long run because they eat all of it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Dela Cruz

customer_reviews.title: This was put together to sell, not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This could NOT have come from the company like this. This was put together, possibly, at a warehouse just to sell. The cars were all dented and crushed in and there was only 3 of one flavor, 2 of another, and they filled the rest with the final flavor - my cats least favorite unfortunately. I bought to cases of these and they were both the same. NOT as advertised. This was NOT what I paid for and I will not be buying this again. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Not me
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how this got delivered to my house I never heard it. I think my cats have my password to Amazon. Many of food shipments coming daily they seem to love this.
customer_reviews.author: Duane P

customer_reviews.title: Artie loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My kitty, Artie (Artemis) absolutely loves all 3 varieties of Fancy Feast that come in this box. They have a sauce that he loves and since I break it up into 2 - 3 feedings I drizzle 1 - 11⁄2 TBSP of water over it for a little extra sauce which he always laps up first. The cost per ounce is in line with the store and it's delivered to the door!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very good cat food
customer_reviews.text: My cat really loves this version of Fancy Feast. She is very picky, but eats more of this than just about any other kind of wet cat food I can find.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Lick the bowl clean- it's that good!
customer_reviews.text: Fluffy loves it! Looks good enough to try it myself but have fought off the urge! Doesnt stay in the bowl long enough to have leftovers! Licks it clean!
customer_reviews.author: PowderMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Both cats love this food.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food. Whether or not they have good taste or not is entirely up to them. I tried many foods and they just won't eat them so this is what they get. They get a can a day and I have an autofeeder that portions out Fussy Cat dry which is a premium food. The price here is much better than at the supermarket unless there is a sale. I rarely see this on sale though. My only wish is that Amazon would carry the boxed set of this in turkey as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Gravy & Flakes vs. Pate
customer_reviews.text: We have three cats. All three of them would prefer to eat the ‘gravy’ instead of the ‘meat’ no matter what kind of cat food we buy. That said, this specific cat food had ‘ large flakes in gravy.’ Our cats lick off the gravy, leave the flakes, and rarely come back when they are hungry a few hours later. We are learning that ‘pâté’ is a much better fit for our cats.
customer_reviews.author: Martie

customer_reviews.title: I seem to be ordering more and more from Amazon, so happy to do business with you. DS
customer_reviews.text: My rescue cat seems to like it very much and I noticed that you carry another brand that she likes so I will be placing another order so I never run out. I am 76 and homebound and this is a godsent. I seem to be ordering more and more from Amazon, so happy to do business with you. DS
customer_reviews.author: Haven’t read it Just put in in it in my did not want to miss it. library

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: My cat mostly eats pates but once or twice a week I give him this and he loves it. He gobbles it up pretty fast. I have found he eats a third of the can in one sitting so I store the leftovers in the fridge and serve it three times a day in addition to his dry food. It is a little pricey but its my cat's favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Two out of three
customer_reviews.text: My two boys ate two out of the three flavors . They love Fancy Feast usually. Chicken Fare is the favorite in the medley varieties.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I have three cats. It's the only wet food they've ever eaten. I share one can between the three of them every night. Still they're managing to get fat. I probably should pick up their bowls of dry cat food once in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD KITTY FOOD
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats loves this food because it has a creamy consistency and good taste. My other car likes pate better. Fancy Feast is not the healthiest kitty food but also not the worst either. I have tried everything with my cats and they like Fancy Feast so I stick with it and try to give them variety. This particular taste gives them variety from the tried and true boring pate.
customer_reviews.author: Levanah Shell Bdolak

customer_reviews.title: cats eat around the veg
customer_reviews.text: My cats really like the "green can" Fancy Feast, although they seem to leave most of the veggie pieces behind. This is probably because they are carnivores. Nevertheless, they seem to eat more of the can than the plain meat varieties, probably because they are inscrutable cats.... Four stars because I think the veg bits are there to impress the owner, not the cat.
customer_reviews.author: Snapper

customer_reviews.title: First time I have a problem
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t the first time I get this wet food from them. I guess bc everything it’s going on with the virus, it took a really long time to get it delivered. But also, I’m missing one can, and the others ones are kinda messy. Not sure what happened. I haven’t have any problems before. My cat likes this variety a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Wicki Gambetta

customer_reviews.title: Might want to check other boxes, this was crazy.
customer_reviews.text: The cans had exploded in the box. The cans were exploded down to the third level in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Can't Argue With Success
customer_reviews.text: This is my old cat's favorite. He will eat this whenever it is offered - and he will walk away from most other brands, regardless of price. Since he is 19 1/2, I listen to him and let him have his way.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for cat food
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this flavor of Fancy Feast, they always finish the entire can. I have tries dozens of different brands and flavors but this flavor seems to be their favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: PURRFECT!  Two paws up!
customer_reviews.text: Well, this review is based on my perception of what my cats think of this food. They seem to prefer the flavor of food above the others we have tried. When we serve this food to them they quickly devour it. I am sure the cats would say portion sizes could be bigger, but I think they are adequate.
customer_reviews.author: coastsearcher

customer_reviews.title: Not actually meat
customer_reviews.text: Not real chicken, fake shreds of chicken in a lot of sauce. One cat ate it, the other cat rejected it. Will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: nj shore

customer_reviews.title: Kitties say, “Yum!”
customer_reviews.text: My kitties love this food. I buy them all the different assorted flavors. Tuscany, Florentine, etc. The only thing that would make this better is if it came with the Muddy Mudskipper Cat Pan Caddy to clean my 3 litter boxes after they have digested this tasty food and are ready to evacuate their bowels.
customer_reviews.author: Audio Phile

customer_reviews.title: Cat does not like it
customer_reviews.text: I hoped my finicky cats would like this but they don't like it. My cat licks off the gravy but will not eat the food.
customer_reviews.author: Diona F. McDaniels

customer_reviews.title: Picky kitties need not apply
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea I'd adding "greens" into my cat's food. (Which turned out to be a little bit of spinach.) My cat who is not really that finicky did not like any of the included flavors. Other than beef, he has turned his nose up to any other flavor of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: Damaged cans.
customer_reviews.text: Almost all the cans in the box were damaged (crumpled and dented) in addition there were to be 8 cans of each flavor but instead we had 9, 8, and 7. It appears this box was put together by hand using damaged cans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YOUR CAT Will LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: My Cat, Buffy, LOVES this cat food. I plan on buying more. Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Lovelywife

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: When I buy the same variety pack of Fancy Feast in the grocery store, my cats eat it. This time when I bought it through Amazon both my cats smelled it on their plates and walked away. I tried several more cans, different flavors, and neither cat would touch after smelling it. I don’t know what accounts for this, but I certainly will never buy it on Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hope Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Looks good enough to eat
customer_reviews.text: My stray cat is not crazy about this. It looks good to me. The herbs are visible- kinda looks like human food. I just notice he leaves a bit, which he never does with some other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie J. Vail

customer_reviews.title: My picky Siamese loves this
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's cat food, I can't really give a comprehensive review since I don't eat it. But, my little guy scarfs it down and it agrees with his tummy, do it gets 4 stars. I love the convenience of being able to order and have it show up on my doorstep in a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: 4catsinidaho

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Both of my picky cats love this food. They didn’t like the other flavor variety. One of my cats has a sensitive stomach, but these didn’t make her throw up, so yay! They love their canned food so much, they get angry if it’s not served on time. Ah, cat gratitude.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Meek

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it
customer_reviews.text: There only food my fancy a$$ cat wants to eat. People who say "just feed your cat something else. When he gets hungry enough, he'll eat it" are dog owners. I only wish it came in the big size cans or that my cat could win a sponsorship.
customer_reviews.author: EALong19

customer_reviews.title: Great choice of food for my cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat love the Medleys. Every time that I have bought them he has enjoyed them. He likes the flavor and enjoys eating it all in one sitting. The value for the price though, i feel they are a bit overpriced. Portion size is smaller than what i am used to giving to my cat so will have to use two of the cans. good quality cat food.
customer_reviews.author: BigPapiCulo87

customer_reviews.title: My cat has tummy issues...
customer_reviews.text: Kitty has serious digestive issues. Wet food only. She's terribly picky. I've tried all types of cat food, and this one she likes the best. I do mix extra water with it, and Miralax, and because of the gravy in this type, she hops right up to eat. The bits of food are small and easy for her to digest. Will keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa1106

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand of cat food that my cat will eat! She loves fancy feast medleys. It’s hard to find it in stores now, even places like Petco doesn’t sell it anymore. When I found it on here for a good price I had to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Our two cats seem to enjoy it, and I am sure the dog would ...
customer_reviews.text: Our two cats seem to enjoy it, and I am sure the dog would as well, but we do TRY to not let him have any..he can be kinda sneaky about it, though....but I personally have not tasted any of the cat food (or the dog food for that matter) I have ordered and rc'd...so the 5 stars are from the cats (well, n probably from the dog too from the times he DID manage to sneak some :) The box and the cans were in good shape though
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: etc but this is her favorite. Can you say Diva- she eats a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat Maggie, a pure bred seal point Siamese only eats this type of Fancy Feast. Yes we have tried all the Fancy Feast, from pate, grilled, etc but this is her favorite. Can you say Diva- she eats a bit then comes back eats a bit more until the bowl is clean. She loved this food ! It has a lot of chicken in it and the sauce looks really yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Mum of Raphael

customer_reviews.title: Great Food for Happy Cats
customer_reviews.text: The Fancy Feast canned and dry foods are my cats favorites and the excellent variety of flavor types and combinations make it easy to feed something new almost every day. I buy many different flavors by the case and reorder regularly. The proteins come in varieties such as pate's, gravy lovers, veges, veges & rice, with cheese...the list goes on! They are reasonably priced but very gourmet.
customer_reviews.author: fuzzymitton

customer_reviews.title: Sam loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is her favorite wet cat food. She gets 2 cans in the morning, then I leave out a portion of dry cat food for the rest of the day and night.
customer_reviews.author: K K Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: My picky cat approves
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these. She has to have medicine mixed into her food so it’s important to find something she will eat. This is one of the few foods I can get her knowing she will finish it.
customer_reviews.author: rziegle

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, depending on which cat
customer_reviews.text: I have finicky cats and never know their moods. Sometimes they just lick the sauce and other times they eat it all.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great value compared to the grocery store - box was missing 2 cans
customer_reviews.text: These bulk multi packs are such a great value. I buy them often. Just check your boxes, I was shortchanged two cans in my last delivery. There should be 4 layers of six cans, but the third layer only had 4 cans.
customer_reviews.author: KikilvsBP1

customer_reviews.title: It's all Lucy will eat
customer_reviews.text: The only catfood my youngest cat will eat (I have 4) but oh my..... The gas she gets is horrible! Wish I could find something else she'd digest better. I've tried nearly every brand... Wet and dry 😔
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: My cats' flavor of choice
customer_reviews.text: Of all the canned cat foods on the market, this is the favorite one that my four cats eat. I give it to them every day and they especially like the sauce that the meat is in in the Florentine Medley. I've tried some of the other flavors in this line of Fancy Feast canned foods, but this is their flavor of choice.
customer_reviews.author: S. Warfield

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Love The Variety
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to have three different preparations in one box. 30 cans is the perfect size for my cats and for the postal carrier.
customer_reviews.author: NMats

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Several different flavors in small size cans. Cats love the taste but you might have to open more then one because of the small size.
customer_reviews.author: MickeyT

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love This
customer_reviews.text: This food is so tasty that even cats who don't have much of an appetite for whatever reason, usually eat this. I have given it to my own cats as well as the shelter cats who won't eat.
customer_reviews.author: MARY ZIMMERMANN

customer_reviews.title: Love our Seller/vendor quick shipping great products!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 kitties love this line of wet food, each box has 3 flavors with a gravy sauce. Our big cat, Meow is notorious for lapping up all the gravy first thing and then later returns to eat the food.
customer_reviews.author: shellrenee

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Approved
customer_reviews.text: My Kitties (3) all prefer the Fancy Feast Medleys to any other cat food, with the exception of the beef and salmon flavors. When I find it at a discounted price I buy several cases.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonheart

customer_reviews.title: Yummy looking stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat really loves this line and when it comes to wet food, she’s very picky. She likes most dry foods but not the wet, especially dislikes pate’. This food looks and smells like people food with it’s creamy white florentine sauce and greens. Yes, it’s more expensive than most brands but the fact that she eats every last drop makes it more cost effective in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Barb McD

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exquisite sauce! Mmm! Nom nom nom! So chickeny, so fishy, so creamy! *slurp!* It hits the spot! I just wish there were more! >^o.O^< ~Titania and Nutter
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Gravy lickin' Good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great variety pack. My cats LOVE the sauces. I would like to see a similar collection in the Wild Salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Gravyaholic Aoki the Monster Princezzz Feline actually LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: My cat Aoki is addicted to gravy. She licks the gravy off canned food then leaves the meat. Always. Even if she’s still hungry. THIS food - howevie - she actually EATS. So amen to that. To her, this is like a cupcake with so much nummy nummy frosting that it’s ALL frosting. (But it’s not cuz I can see cake in there.) (I mean meat. Sorrry.)
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: You don't know what you are going to get
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you get 24 cans and sometimes you get 12, for the same price, you just never know what will turn up. It can be a great deal, or a not so good deal depending. I've ordered the exact same thing more than once and it's always a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kohl

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good Enough To Eat
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this! It looks good enough to eat. My husband thought I was giving her stew one night. She will no longer eat the other Fancy Feast I used to give her and this seems to be the only place I can find this. The price is cheaper than the Fancy Feast I get her from the supermarket so I will continue buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gagliano

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kitties = Happy pet parents
customer_reviews.text: Gravy with meaty bites. My two older cats lick their bowls clean. After years of bad smelling fishy ground up mush - the smell of their meals is actually decent...and their breath improved. Each can is the right amount to share between the two, so no messing with covering and refrigerating left overs.
customer_reviews.author: AZN CUST NC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for my finicky cats!
customer_reviews.text: My cats like fancy feast but not every flavor. So they didn't eat every can in this selection. I won't be buying it again for that reason. They are so finicky. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Mulberry St Shoppe

customer_reviews.title: Small for humans, great for adults.
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats favorite wet foods. Personally, the portion size was a little small for me; I felt like I'd have to eat at least 6 cans to feel full. My cats, however, split a can between the two of them and that seems to be the perfect amount for them so that's all that matters really.
customer_reviews.author: Evan R.

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love this
customer_reviews.text: I cannot really give an option as this brand is what they normally eat....However, it is liked by Waya and Yonu, and that makes me and my babies very happy. Try it
customer_reviews.author: JAMES R. ROGERS

customer_reviews.title: Lucifer never leaves a crumb, loves it. Pls add to Subscribe & Save
customer_reviews.text: Lucifer our daughter's cat loves it. Small size makes it convenient to serve as main meal daily. Lucifer rarely leaves any leftovers, not even a crumb. Offset with dry food balance of day. Please add to the Subscribe & Save program.
customer_reviews.author: BlueHusky

customer_reviews.title: yummy
customer_reviews.text: My two cats like the food and dont throw up afterward- that's always a good sign. You car lovers know what I'm talking about .
customer_reviews.author: camrrt

customer_reviews.title: Finicky Feline Feast!
customer_reviews.text: My finicky cat that loves gravy usually leaves all the solids behind, but she eats everything and licks the bowl clean with this food!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy in WA

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves the greens and variety!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a picky wet food eater. He only likes chicken and only the shredded pieces. So the greens added to these chicken dishes give him a variety. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Emotional Support Felines love this brand of wet food, but due to the prices in the stores I'm unable to afford this. Through this seller I'm able to provide my 2 cats with their favorite food due to the low price and quick shipping. Thank you so much, Heather :)
customer_reviews.author: Heather T.

customer_reviews.title: shipment billed as medley (i.e. variety) but only three selections packed barely qualifies.
customer_reviews.text: My cats (16-17 years with us) would prefer a monthly selection of at least five or six different kinds of fare. As it is I have to supplement their breakfasts and suppers with offerings from other suppliers, which rather defeats the purpose. Am trying to avoid going to the supermarket for the duration of the lockdown. Regrettably must cancel our subscription accordingy.
customer_reviews.author: Paco Camino

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky cats!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Siamese that would eat anything and everything you put in front of him, however my other (also Siamese) is the pickiest cat ever! She loves Fancy Feast Medleys! If this review has helped you in any way, please click the YES button. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: BlueZebra

customer_reviews.title: My cats like it.
customer_reviews.text: I only gave a 3 for "flavor"; as I do not eat cat food and my cats will not tell me how it taste. They seem to like it!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats just love these flavors. They get canned food every morning, and can’t wait for it. They lick the bowl to get every drop.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Frankie the cat tries to eat this stuff right out my hands before I even get the foil off.
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle

customer_reviews.title: My two finicky cats will eat this brand while refusing many others.
customer_reviews.text: My two finicky cats like this cat food and it is difficult to find brands they will eat.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great
customer_reviews.text: Well the cat loves these. I ask her if she wants the fancy (white regular fancy feast) or the fancy fancy (green slightly more expensive medley fancy feast) and try to balance out which ones I'm giving her. Overall a great product
customer_reviews.author: Carla H

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: My cat wouldn't touch any of these. They look awful when you pour them into their dish.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Meow-nificent!
customer_reviews.text: Cats seem to absolutely love this stuff, possibly more than friskies. This is literally the perfect combo pack for our cats because they love poultry and tuna the most. I dont care what people say, animals have taste buds and I have never seen our cats lick their lips with their food as much as this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Prima Dona cat prefers Primavera
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats turns up her nose at other cat food. She quite prefers the Primavera over anything else.
customer_reviews.author: J. Haskell

product_meta.title: Purina Fancy Feast Medleys Adult Wet Cat Food Variety Pack
product_meta.description: Color:Chicken Variety Pack| Size:(12) 3 oz. CansFeed your adult cat the inspired culinary combination of real white meat chicken, long grain rice, garden greens and veggies covered in a delicious, delicate sauce when you open a can of Purina Fancy Feast Medleys White Meat Chicken Recipe Variety Collection wet cat food. Created with discerning cats in mind, this exceptional, high-quality cat food has the tasty texture cats love and an artful blend of ingredients that keeps them coming back for more. The difference is in the details when you dish out this pet-pleasing concoction destined to become a daily favorite. Each easy-to-open can offers 100% complete and balanced nutrition for adult cats. Watch your favorite feline lick her lips when you peel back the convenient pull-tab top. Choose from Chicken Florentine, Tuscany or Primavera blends to keep even a picky eater on top of her game as you do your best to satisfy your cat and give her what she needs.
feature_bullets: Twelve (12) 3 Oz. Cans - Purina Fancy Feast White Meat Chicken Recipe Variety Collection Cat Food
Medleys Variety Pack Offering 12 Cans Of Our Favorite White Meat Chicken Recipes
Each Delicious Entree Is Prepared With Inspired Combinations Of Ingredients Like Long Grain Rice, Garden Veggies & Greens

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
